column1: * 1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to William Ready (5 March 1959).
* 1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Eileen Elgar (5 March 1964) (see Letter 255) and encloses the manuscripts Concerning ... The Hoard and Kinship of the Half-elven.
* 1971 - Voice actor Yuri Lowenthal is born.
* 2004 - The first day of "RingCon" in wikipedia:Seattle.
* 2015 - Artist and linguist Tom Loback dies.
** Théoden and company reach Isengard at noon. They have a parley with Saruman and camp at Dol Baran.
** Peregrin Took looks into the Orthanc-stone and a short time later a Nazgûl passes over the camp. In response
column2: Gandalf sets out with the Hobbit for Minas Tirith.

column1: ** Frodo Baggins hides in sight of the Morannon
column2: and leaves at dusk.Category:Datesde:5. Märzfi:5. maaliskuuta
